document_data.name: Dispel Illusion
document_data.mainbody: '''''Dispel illusion''''' was a common spell used by [[illusionist]]s and [[wu jen]] in [[Kara-Tur]].
document_data.Effects: When cast, the spell instantly dismissed any [[illusion]] or phantasm created by another wizard of a different [[Magic#Schools|school of magic]]. If the wizard was a practitioner of the same school as the caster, the spell was identical to the ''[[dispel magic]]'' spell.
document_data.Components: The spell required [[Verbal component|verbal]] and [[somatic component|somatic]] components.
